experience.description_zh: 实习期间，我主导了覆盖模型训练、推理增强与评估的全栈数据策略优化。在训练效率方面，我针对在线场景设计了基于蒸馏与 GPU-KMeans 的数据筛减策略，在性能基本无损（<3%）的前提下将算力消耗降低 \textbf{4x}。在推理能力方面，我搭建了集成 Mathematica 的自动化数学泛化与形式化校验流水线（封装为 SDK），将新题准确率提升至 \textbf{99%}，并将竞赛级题目的泛化率从 7.8% 跃升至 \textbf{63.95%}。此外，为确保评估可靠性，我构建了混合规则与向量检索的数据清洗系统，剔除噪声与离群样本，沉淀了高质量的同分布（IID）对话评测集。
experience.description: During my internship, I focused on advancing data-centric pipelines across training, reasoning, and evaluation phases. To optimize online training efficiency, I designed a data pruning strategy using distillation and GPU-KMeans, reducing compute overhead by \textbf{4x} with negligible performance loss (<3%). Simultaneously, to enhance mathematical reasoning, I engineered an automated generalization and formal verification SDK (integrating Mathematica) that boosted new-item accuracy to \textbf{99%} and competition-level problem generalization to \textbf{63.95%}. Furthermore, I established robust model evaluation standards by constructing high-quality, in-distribution dialogue datasets using a hybrid cleaning pipeline combining rule-based heuristics and embedding retrieval.

experience.description_zh: 研究情境对话推荐与大模型/多模态对话系统，围绕任务设计、数据构建、基线建模和评测体系开展工作。导师：Prof. Wenjie Li。
experience.description: Situated Conversational Recommendation - Investigating techniques related to large-scale pre-trained language models and multi-modal dialogue system with the goal of increasing user engagement in our dialogue system. By leveraging multiple types of information, we aim to create a more engaging experience for the user. Supervisor: Prof. Wenjie, Li

experience.description_zh: 研究目标导向对话推荐与知识增强生成，相关工作发表于 KaRS 2021 与 AAAI 2023。导师：李文婕教授。
experience.description: Conversational Recommender System - Investigated the problem of target-guided knowledge-aware recommendation dialogue and design a dialogue generation system to make high-quality recommendations through interactive conversations proactively and naturally. This work has been accepted by the 3rd Workshop of Knowledge-aware and Conversational Recommender Systems (KaRS 2021) and the 37th AAAI conference on Artificial Intelligence (AAAI 2023). Supervisor: Prof. Wenjie, Li

experience.description_zh: 研究机器阅读理解，提出分层全局信息传递与记忆流机制，在 CoQA 数据集上取得有竞争力结果。导师：潘嵘教授。
experience.description: Machine Reading Comprehension - Proposed a Hierarchical global-aware Information Transmission mechanism, which makes use of the interaction between local-aware information and global-aware information to improve the effectiveness of the model. Employed a Memory Flow mechanism for storing and modifying information from historical questions and answers. The experimental results on CoQA datasets showed that our model obtained competitive results compared to the existing methods. Supervisor: Prof. Rong Pan

experience.department_zh: 中科院深圳先进院 NLP 研究组
experience.description_zh: 研究对话式机器阅读理解，提出层次化对话流迁移与推理模型（HCFTR），增强多轮语境建模能力。导师：杨敏教授。
experience.description: Conversational Machine Reading Comprehension - Proposed a Hierarchical Conversation Flow Transition and Reasoning (HCFTR) model for conversational machine reading comprehension. Designed a multi-flow transition mechanism to integrate global-aware information flow transition and make dynamic reasoning. Developed a multi-level flow-context attention mechanism to fuse multiple levels of hierarchical fine-grained representations and perform advanced reasoning. Supervisor: Prof. Min Yang

experience.department: Mobile Internet and Financial Big Data Lab
experience.department_zh: 移动互联网与金融大数据实验室
experience.description_zh: 研究面向服务计算的 API 推荐，相关成果发表于 ICSE 2018 与 IEEE Access 2019，并获中山大学优秀毕业论文。导师：郑子彬教授。
experience.description: Service-Oriented Computing - Designed a Group Preference based API Recommendation System using the Bayesian Personalized Ranking Model. Recommended appropriate APIs for Mashup (a new type of service in internet by integrating multiple sources or functions on the network). This work was also my undergraduate thesis's topic, given the award of the SYSU Excellent Graduation Thesis and accepted by International Conference on Software Engineering (ICSE-2018) and IEEE Access-2019. Supervisor: Prof. ZiBin Zheng
